title: Connect Seamlessly Across the Globe with Mauritius
meta_description: Get connected instantly in Mauritius with Pirate Mobile’s eSIM. No physical SIM required! Enjoy seamless data and voice services with easy activation.

faqs.question: Is my phone compatible with the Mauritius eSIM?
faqs.answer: Most newer smartphones, such as the iPhone XR and above, Samsung Galaxy S20 series and later, and Google Pixel models, support eSIM. Check your phone's settings to confirm compatibility.

faqs.question: How do I activate my Mauritius eSIM?
faqs.answer: After purchasing the eSIM from Pirate Mobile, you’ll receive a QR code. Simply scan this code on your device to activate the eSIM and connect to the local network in Mauritius.

faqs.question: Can I use the Mauritius eSIM for both data and voice services?
faqs.answer: Yes, our Mauritius eSIM supports both data and voice services, depending on the plan you select. Be sure to check the plan details when purchasing.

faqs.question: Can I keep my regular SIM while using the Mauritius eSIM?
faqs.answer: Yes, if your phone supports dual SIM functionality, you can use both your regular physical SIM and the Mauritius eSIM simultaneously.

faqs.question: How long does it take to activate the Mauritius eSIM?
faqs.answer: Activation is almost instant. Once you scan the QR code on your compatible device, your eSIM should be ready to use in just a few minutes.

schema.name: eSIM Mauritius
schema.description: Pirate Mobile Limited, a company incorporated under the laws of Guernsey, whose company number is 71908 and whose registered office is at Avenue House, St. Julians Avenue, ST. Peters Port, Guernsey, GY11WA
